it wasn't ankle biting, it was a sweep.........
----- Original Message -----
From: "Teltoli / Rexon" <teltoli@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, May 12, 2000 4:17 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> Kit quickly feels herself being lifted up, with a sharp pain in her
ankles. As she lands on the ground, she twists in the air and lands on her
knees on the forest floor. She staggers to her feet, pushing the pain away.
>
> "Haha.. I doubt that.. fool.. when all you do is ankle-biting!" She barks
harshly..
>
> She puts away her gun, and extends her claws on her hands. With a grin she
runs up, going for slashing the claws at his face, aiming for his optics..
>
> ------Original Message------
> From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>
> To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> Sent: May 12, 2000 6:31:00 PM GMT
> Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
>
>
> Sinesis quickly reaches up his hand and grabs his chest where he was
> shot.... "soooo! Maximal!...i WILL be your worst nightmare when you see me
> in action!...." he said....he swooped down catching her in a scissor
sweep,
> which sweeps them up while wrenching their ankles......
